_description: SQL query equivalents for MySQL, PostgreSQL, and BigQuery

show_tables.postgres: SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE schemaname = 'public'

show_columns.postgres: SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = '{table_name}'

show_randow_rows.mysql: SELECT * FROM {table_name} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT {n}
show_randow_rows.postgres: SELECT * FROM {table_name} ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT {n}
show_randow_rows.bigquery: SELECT * FROM `{project_id}.{dataset_id}.{table_name}` ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT {n}

show_tb_schema.postgres: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = '{tb_name}'
show_tb_schema.bigquery: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM `{project_id}.{dataset_id}.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS` WHERE table_name = '{tb_name}'

table_exist.postgres: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = '{table_name}')
